trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback"></xref>, <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create an InstallEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato InstallEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestir√† l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
